Title: Design Pattern Engine
Description: Design Pattern Engine makes it easier for designers and programmers to employ design patterns in their projects using diagrams and visuals, which automatically generates the code based on the flow. It is developed in C# and WPF using Prism Composite Application Architecture.

Project Description
Design Pattern Engine makes it easier for designers and programmers to employ design patterns in their projects using diagrams and visuals, which automatically generates the code based on the flow. It is developed in C# and WPF using Prism Composite Application Architecture.
